title: Cloud Computing Consultations
tagline: Expert cloud guidance without enterprise costs
overview: Navigate the cloud with confidence. Get expert guidance on AWS infrastructure, cost optimization, and migration strategies without hiring a full-time cloud team.
whatIOffer: 7+ years AWS expertise in cloud infrastructure and cost optimization
Cloud migration support with minimal downtime and clear rollback strategies
Architecture reviews covering security, performance, and disaster recovery
Disaster recovery planning and continuous monitoring setup
howItWorks: Free consultation to understand your cloud needs and challenges
Fixed-fee proposal based on estimated hours (no surprise charges)
Regular progress updates with architecture diagrams and recommendations
Documentation and knowledge transfer included for projects over 10 hours

sections.heading: Overview
sections.tagline: Expert cloud guidance without enterprise costs
benefits: 7+ years AWS expertise in cloud infrastructure and cost optimization

Architecture reviews covering security, performance, and disaster recovery
Fixed-fee projects or retainer-based consulting for ongoing optimization
